data.actual_result: Bottom part of the lowercase letter g is cut off in the embed.
data.expected_result: You should be able to see all of the text clearly.
data.short_description: Small bit of the bottom of lowercase letter `g` cut off in the embedded part of a channel invite. (See attached)
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a text channel with lowercase g in it. (The more the better for viewing purpose)  - Get an instant invite link for the text channel with lowercase g and send it to a friend.
